Epic Mickey: Rebrushed Demo
 [Aug 27, 2024, 11:58 am ET] – Share – Viewing Comments

A playable demo for Disney Epic Mickey: Rebrushed is now live for PC and consoles, offering a sample of this remade version of this 3D platformer. You can download the Windows edition on Steam. Here's a Demo Trailer with a look, and here are the deets:
Step into the fantastical world of Disney Epic Mickey: Rebrushed! Try the Free Demo now and get a glimpse of Mickey Mouse’s exciting adventure in this stunningly reimagined 3D platformer.

  • Explore a reimagined Wasteland, full of Disney's timeless characters and stories.
  • Wield the magic brush: Paint to create, thinner to alter. Every choice shapes your story.
  • Meet Oswald the Lucky Rabbit, Disney's original star, in a rich, narrative-driven world.
  • Enjoy advanced gameplay with new abilities and enhanced visuals in a classic setting.
    Mickey has new moves such as dash, ground pound and sprinting.

View : : :

Re: Epic Mickey: Rebrushed Demo Aug 27, 2024, 17:24

 Kalthorn
 
Pretty sure everyone can pass on this one. I reluctantly broke my rules regarding hype and day-1 purchasing due to the Warren Specter of it all. Bought it for the wife and I to play together on Wii and we never finished it. Very basic platforming and area painting...yay.

sliv
 
Prez wrote on Aug 27, 2024, 13:30:
If my memory serves this has never been on PC has it? I know that I have always been interested in it but I know that I have never tried it. Any game by Warren Spector has me interested immediately. Other than maybe Will Wright and Sid Meier, (Miyamoto and Kojima should probably be up there) there's never been a more visionary developer.

I think it was only released on the Wii and the difficulty was basically set at "story mode". I think the repetitiveness was having the waggle at the screen all the time to paint which had its limitations on accuracy and this was back when 42" TV's was considered big. Using a gamepad should be more enjoyable and hopefully they'll allow for higher difficulty.
